speaker: Sofia
text: We’ve finally defined the scope of the new feature, and it aligns with the needs of our clients.
ipa: wiːv ˈfaɪnəli dɪˈfaɪnd ðə skoʊp əv ðə nu ˈfiːʧər | ənd ɪt əˈlaɪnz wɪð ðə nidz əv aʊər ˈklaɪənts
stress: WE'VE FINALLY DEFINED the SCOPE of the NEW FEATURE | and it ALIGNS with the NEEDS of our CLIENTS
linking:
"defined the" → /dɪˈfaɪnd ðə/ (d links to th)
"aligns with" → /əˈlaɪnz wɪð/ (z links to w)

speaker: Tomás
text: That’s great! I already started designing a solution with minimal infrastructure changes. I think that’ll help speed up development.
ipa: ðæts ɡreɪt | aɪ ɔlˈrɛdi ˈstɑrtɪd dɪˈzaɪnɪŋ ə səˈluʃən wɪð ˈmɪnəməl ˌɪnfrəˈstrʌkʧər ˈʧeɪnʤəz | aɪ θɪŋk ðætəl hɛlp spiːd ʌp dɪˈvɛləpmənt
stress: THAT'S GREAT | I ALREADY STARTED DESIGNING a SOLUTION with MINIMAL INFRASTRUCTURE CHANGES | I THINK THAT'LL HELP SPEED UP DEVELOPMENT
linking:
"started designing" → /ˈstɑrtɪd dɪˈzaɪnɪŋ/ (d links to d)
"help speed" → /hɛlp spiːd/ (p links to s)

speaker: Sofia
text: I like that. We also reviewed the plan to reduce user drop-off during onboarding, and the team agreed it's a top priority.
ipa: aɪ laɪk ðæt | wi ˈɔlsoʊ rɪˈvjud ðə plæn tu rɪˈdus ˈjuzər ˈdrɑp ɔf ˈdʊrɪŋ ˈɑnˌbɔrdɪŋ | ənd ðə tim əˈɡrid ɪts ə tɑp praɪˈɔrəti
stress: I LIKE THAT | we ALSO REVIEWED the PLAN to REDUCE USER DROP-OFF during ONBOARDING | and the TEAM AGREED it's a TOP PRIORITY
linking:
"reviewed the" → /rɪˈvjud ðə/ (d links to th)
"agreed it's" → /əˈɡrid ɪts/ (d links to i)

speaker: Tomás
text: Yeah, I saw that in the document shared by the UX team. They had some ideas based on the recent feedback.
ipa: jæ | aɪ sɔ ðæt ɪn ðə ˈdɑkjəmənt ʃɛrd baɪ ðə ju ɛks tim | ðeɪ hæd səm aɪˈdiəz beɪst ɑn ðə ˈrisənt ˈfidbæk
stress: YEAH | I SAW THAT in the DOCUMENT SHARED by the UX TEAM | they HAD SOME IDEAS BASED on the RECENT FEEDBACK
linking:
"document shared" → /ˈdɑkjəmənt ʃɛrd/ (t links to sh)
"based on" → /beɪst ɑn/ (d links to o)

speaker: Sofia
text: Exactly. Plus, we got a list of action items from the meeting with the investors. They want to see faster results.
ipa: ɪɡˈzæktli | plʌs | wi ɡɑt ə lɪst əv ˈækʃən ˈaɪtəmz frəm ðə ˈmitɪŋ wɪð ði ɪnˈvɛstərz | ðeɪ wɑnt tu si ˈfæstər rɪˈzʌlts
stress: EXACTLY | PLUS | we GOT a LIST of ACTION ITEMS from the MEETING with the INVESTORS | they WANT to SEE FASTER RESULTS
linking:
"list of" → /lɪst əv/ (t links to ə)
"meeting with" → /ˈmitɪŋ wɪð/ (g links to w)

speaker: Tomás
text: What about the backend module updated last month? Is it stable?
ipa: wʌt əˈbaʊt ðə ˈbækˌɛnd ˈmɑʤul ˈʌpˌdeɪtɪd læst mʌnθ | ɪz ɪt ˈsteɪbəl
stress: WHAT ABOUT the BACKEND MODULE UPDATED LAST MONTH | is it STABLE
linking:
"about the" → /əˈbaʊt ðə/ (t links to th)
"updated last" → /ˈʌpˌdeɪtɪd læst/ (d links to l)

speaker: Sofia
text: Yes, that’s a module tested with high concurrency scenarios. No major issues reported.
ipa: jɛs | ðæts ə ˈmɑʤul ˈtɛstɪd wɪð haɪ kənˈkɜrənsi səˈnɛrioʊz | noʊ ˈmeɪʤər ˈɪʃuz rɪˈpɔrtɪd
stress: YES | that's a MODULE TESTED with HIGH CONCURRENCY SCENARIOS | no MAJOR ISSUES REPORTED
linking:
"tested with" → /ˈtɛstɪd wɪð/ (d links to w)
"issues reported" → /ˈɪʃuz rɪˈpɔrtɪd/ (s links to r)

speaker: Tomás
text: Awesome. That’ll give us a good base to implement the changes. Just send me the final version of the requirements, and I’ll get started.
ipa: ˈɔsəm | ðætəl ɡɪv ʌs ə ɡʊd beɪs tu ˈɪmpləˌmɛnt ðə ˈʧeɪnʤəz | ʤəst sɛnd mi ðə ˈfaɪnəl ˈvɜrʒən əv ðə rɪˈkwaɪərmənts | ənd aɪl ɡɛt ˈstɑrtɪd
stress: AWESOME | that'll GIVE US a GOOD BASE to IMPLEMENT the CHANGES | just SEND ME the FINAL VERSION of the REQUIREMENTS | and I'LL GET STARTED
linking:
"give us" → /ɡɪv ʌs/ (v links to u)
"send me" → /sɛnd mi/ (d links to m)

speaker: Sofia
text: Will do! Let’s also meet next week to discuss the best time to launch the beta version.
ipa: wɪl du | lɛts ˈɔlsoʊ mit nɛkst wik tu dɪˈskʌs ðə bɛst taɪm tu lɔnʧ ðə ˈbeɪtə ˈvɜrʒən
stress: WILL DO | let's ALSO MEET NEXT WEEK to DISCUSS the BEST TIME to LAUNCH the BETA VERSION
linking:
"meet next" → /mit nɛkst/ (t links to n)
"launch the" → /lɔnʧ ðə/ (ch links to th)
